input.sentences: i was so happy to see my friends and light off some fireworks .

i loved sitting on the ground to get a good look .
yay | this was so much fun !

output.sentences: Monica enjoys spending time with her friends.
They often do exciting things together like play with fireworks.
She is enjoying watching the night sky.
Monica and her friends had a great time with the fireworks and now have a big mess to clean up.
